review: Really upset with how PrimeDay handled the purchase of the Firestick. None available starting at 9AM. I  joined the wait list, which provided a half second flash of a dialog box that I could order, but then never provided an add to cart. This happened several times. I tried straight through 11 PM, which was like playing Whack the Mole for an entire day. I've been a loyal Prime customer since 2009 and am pretty disgusted.
